entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DEBUG_EXCEPTION_CATCH_HANDLER_FOUND events missing for exceptions caught by func-eval #102178
  • [API Proposal]: Stream.CopyTo{Async} with count #102177
  • GB1030 dotnet info #102174
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute` #102173
    9.0.0
  • Android AOT startup crash #102166
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(genRegMask(initReg) & intRegState.rsCalleeRegArgMaskLiveIn) == 0' in win-x86 #102161
    9.0.0
  • JIT: RBO's utilization of liberal VNs is illegal #102158
    9.0.0
  • WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102157
    9.0.0
  • [mono] [aot] Mono mini fullAOT CI job is failing due to Failed to load AOT module X86_Sse2_r/ro.dll in aot-only mode #102150
    Future
  • Bizarre decimal-to-double behavior difference on same machine, same code #102149
    9.0.0
  • [browser] More flexible boot config schema #102148
    Future

Closed

  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #90971
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Baseservices runtime tests failed in Mono fullAOT llvm job #92883
    Future
  • Test failure for TensorPrimitives MinNumber and MaxNumber on Arm64 #102156
  • Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanDestinationFunctions_SpecialValues #101731
    9.0.0
  • arm32 fails in CI with "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found" #102030
  • [wasm-wasi]: release build fails, debug build succeeds #100488
  • NativeAOT metadata encodings #101333
  • Failure to run console .exe after .net8 upgrade if hostfxr.dll is present. #98335
  • Show a prompt to users when opening a .NET exe on Windows asking if they want to install .NET automatically if they don't have .NET installed #101918
  • [API Proposal]: Method for creating a List #102100
  • mono: Implement support for generic unmanaged calli #98819
    9.0.0
  • Hot reload fails to flow generic constraints to the inherited class #100826
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer doesn't support valid TimeSpan formats #100538
    Future
  • Consider moving System.IO.Pipelines into the shared framework #28760
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver throws on `CreateJsonTypeInfo` for interfaces with duplicate properties #101673
  • Using UnsafeAccessorAttribute (.NET 8) on struct throws 'System.BadImageFormatException' occurred in Console.dll: 'Invalid usage of UnsafeAccessorAttribute.' #102151
  • High Memory Consumption When Validating Remote Certificates With Client SslStreams #101552
    9.0.0
  • HTTP stress build is broken #101625
    9.0.0
  • `GetFromJsonAsAsyncEnumerable` not working when using custom httpHanlder with compression #102113

PullRequests

Created

  • SVE: Added `LoadVectorx2`, `LoadVectorx3`, `LoadVectorx4` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ulong->double conversion on x64 (without avx512f) #102179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute #102176
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ARM64 LLVM AOT runtime builds to use the generic libclang.so file #102175
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Backport #92375 #102172
    needs-area-label
  • Fix NRE in bulk memmove on x86 #102171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement some more Math APIs #102170
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow using pinvoke registers in the prolog #102165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove reflection from FrameworkDescription #102164
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add InheritServiceKeyAttribute to enable resolving the dependencies with the same key #102160
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Keep delegate alive during invocation #102159
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Suppress export name minification #102155
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fixed the discrepancy between applicationName between normal app launch and HostFactoryResolver launch #102152
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • make SocketAddress useable after receive timeout #102142
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: SVE cleanup - More SVE format merging #102104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Change the ReciprocalEstimate and ReciprocalSqrtEstimate APIs to be mustExpand on RyuJIT #102098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize bundled_resources key creation, hashing, and comparison #101460
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #100257
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix comments in ZipFileExtensions.ZipArchiveEntry.Extract.cs #100791
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the TensorPrimitives.Min/MaxNumber functions follow the IEEE 754:2019 spec #102162
    area-System.Numerics
  • Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images #102059
    needs-area-label
  • Refactor handling of two immediates in hwintrinsic #102071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0] Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #102147
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.x
  • Fix the typo in IOptionsFactory source documentation #100384
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Backport #92296 and #92438 to release/6.0-staging #101822
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.201, windows: 124.0.6367.201 #102119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix VirtualCallStubManager stats capturing on EE shutdown #102073
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TimeSpanConverter: Less restrict in-range check to allow more timespan formats that would be accepted by Utf8Parser.TryParse #102091
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable building with gcc-14 #101623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.CreateFalseMask*() #102076
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Handle GT_CNS_LNG and GT_CNS_DBL in GenTree::Compare #102137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target NetCoreAppToolCurrent in ILC test projects #102058
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change erroneous use of && to & when used to make a bitmask #101338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix msquic on latest (2.3.5) release #102085
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Use SIMD for block inits with GC fields #102132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder stores to make them amenable to stp optimization #102133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move unicodedata to minipal #102139
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #102083
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Enable custom mmap in MT builds #102064
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Unify `GT_JMP` handling in the backends #102117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Spanify some ``Utf8String`` and ``Utf8StringBuilder`` use #102101
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade GCLogParser to NetCoreAppToolCurrent #101089
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use the cbl-mariner-2.0-cross-amd64 image #102069
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some comment typos #101232
    area-Meta, community-contribution
